title: The Urge
content: e Minthara, you can snap her neck after your character sleeps with her. When you find a Moonlantern to keep yourself protected in the Shadow-Cursed Lands, you'll realize that there's a pixie trapped inside. You can decide to crush her after she's freed. If you unleash your urge and kill Isobel the Cleric, the ward that protects Last Light Inn will fail. Killing everyone there and fail lots of quests. If you allow Shadowheart to kill Nightsong, the ward will also fail and kill Jaheira and Isobel
